tweets.1378: the asean future sustainable leaders 2021 (a-fsl) is an online case competition in which groups of students from secondary and tertiary education had provided ideas on multidisciplinary to solve issues related to the united nations sustainable development goals.
tweets.1379: the group presented the project embrace which stands for emphasis on broader access, a sustainable social network of stakeholders to foster effective partnerships for the achievement of sdgs not just the sdg 17. (you can watch their video here: https://t.co/9doqesbydq)
